entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
